scripts.dev: clear && rm -rf coverage && cp ../index.js node_modules/karma-typescript && cp -R ../lib/* node_modules/karma-typescript/lib/ && karma start
scripts.dev-win: rd /S /Q coverage & copy /Y ..\index.js .\node_modules\karma-typescript\index.js && xcopy /Y /R /S ..\lib\* node_modules\karma-typescript\lib\ & cls & karma start karma.conf.js
